author: Alaa El Mediouri
description: A community website for newcomers providing information about the city, private schools, and local resources.

sections.title: Welcome to Our Community
sections.content: Helping newcomers settle into the city with essential information about the community center, private schools, and other local resources.

sections.title: About This Site
sections.content: This website is designed as a resource hub for our community. Whether you're looking for a private school for your children or other local services, you'll find helpful information here.

sections.title: Find a Community Center Near You
sections.content: Discover local community centers, their locations, and resources.
sections.quote: A strong community is built on shared spaces, open doors, and welcoming hearts.

links.text: Explore Things to Do in Lexington

sections.title: Upcoming Events Calendar
sections.content: Stay up to date with events happening in Lexington.
